sqlMap.select: select concat(c.biz_index) as "bizIndex" from jat_sys_index c where c.biz_type = #bizType# and c.biz_code = #bizCode# and c.biz_date = #bizDate#
sqlMap.insert: insert into jat_sys_index(biz_type, biz_code, biz_date, biz_index)values(#bizType#, #bizCode#, #bizDate#, #bizIndex#)
sqlMap.update: update jat_sys_index a set a.biz_index = a.biz_index + 1 where a.biz_type = #bizType# and a.biz_code = #bizCode# and a.biz_date = #bizDate#
sqlMap.select: select a.id as userid, a.zhanghao as usercode, a.xingming as username from t_xt_yonghu a

select a.entry_code as 'entryCode', a.entry_name as 'entryName', a.entry_type as 'entryType', a.sfsxjg as 'treeFlag', case when a.sfsxjg = 1 then b.f_item_key else null end as 'parentKey', b.item_key as 'itemKey', b.item_value as 'itemValue', b.item_order as 'itemOrder' from t_xt_sjzdlb a, t_xt_sjzdsjx b where a.entry_code = b.entry_code and a.status = 1 and b.status = 1 order by a.entry_type, a.entry_code, b.f_item_key, b.item_order, b.item_key
select a.param_name as "name", a.param_value as "value", a.memo as "memo" from jat_sys_parameter a where a.status = '1' order by a.param_name
select a.id as "orgId", a.name as "orgName", a.leibie as "orgType", a.parentId as "parentId" from view_dwzzjg a order by a.leibie, a.name, a.id
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_xt_fujian(laiyuan, lyid, shunxu, mingcheng, path, status) values(#laiyuan#, #lyid#, #shunxu#, #mingcheng#, #path#, 1)
SELECT last_insert_id() as id
sqlMap.select: select a.id, a.mingcheng, a.path from t_xt_fujian a where a.laiyuan=#billCode# and a.lyid=#headid# order by a.id

select a.id, a.mingcheng, a.path from t_xt_fujian a where a.shunxu=-1 and (lower(a.path) like '%.jpg' or lower(a.path) like '%.png' or lower(a.path) like '%.jpeg' or lower(a.path) like '%.gif' or lower(a.path) like '%.bmp') order by a.id desc limit 0, 50
select a.mingcheng, a.path from t_xt_fujian a where a.id=#value#
sqlMap.update: update t_xt_fujian set laiyuan = #billCode#, lyid = #headid#, create_id = #userid#, create_date = now() where id = #id#
sqlMap.select: select * from (select d.id as 'orgId', d.mchxm as 'orgName', 0 as 'orgType', 0 as 'secondLevelFlag', d.dwzcdzxx as 'dwzcdzxx' from t_dw_dwxx d union ALL select e.id as 'orgId', e.xsdwmc as 'orgName', 0 as 'orgType', 1 as 'secondLevelFlag', f.dwzcdzxx as 'dwzcdzxx' from t_dw_ejdw e inner join t_dw_dwxx f on e.yjdw_id = f.id) aa where aa.orgId = #value#
select dmb.daima as "value", dmb.mingcheng as "text" from t_xt_tzsbfldmb dmb where (dmb.fjdm is null or dmb.fjdm ='') and dmb.dmjb = 1
select dmb.daima as "value", dmb.mingcheng as "text" from t_xt_tzsbfldmb dmb where dmb.fjdm= #fjdm# and dmb.dmjb = #dmjb#
